tag_list: recruiting, career-coaching, consulting, information-technology, staff-augmentation, contract-recruiting
overview:
Executive Recruiter and Career Coach specializing in Sales, Marketing and Professional Services talent for the information technology industry.

Bill Mortimore is the Managing Partner and Founder of Strategic Customer Solutions, LLC (SCS). Based in the Denver Colorado area, SCS provides recruiting and consulting services to small and mid-size companies for full-time and temporary positions. For individuals, SCS offers career transition coaching services to Executives, Senior Managers and Professionals.
